title: SVA
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922210036/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Education](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922210036/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Education) : SVA**

The [School of Visual Arts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922210036/http:/www.schoolofvisualarts.edu/) in New York City is a multi-disciplinary institution, offering a variety of undergraduate and graduate degree programs ranging from general Fine Arts, Illustration and Graphic Design to Art Therapy, Photography and video related media.
author: Zara Evens
